rules.label: value_two_pair_plus
rules.description: Two pair or better using at least one hole card (includes sets/full house).

rules.label: overpair_or_tptk
rules.description: Pocket pair higher than top board card or top pair with top kicker (Q+).

rules.label: top_pair_weak_or_second
rules.description: Top pair with weaker kicker, or second pair showdown value.

rules.label: middle_pair_or_third_minus
rules.description: Third pair or pocket pair under the board providing marginal showdown value.

rules.label: strong_draw
rules.description: Flush draw or open-ended straight draw (including combo draws).

rules.label: weak_draw
rules.description: Gutshot straight draw or backdoor flush draw without stronger made hand.

rules.label: overcards_no_bdfd
rules.description: Two overcards to the board with no backdoor flush draw available.

rules.label: air
rules.description: Hands that do not meet any made hand or draw criteria above.
